question: Some people think that it is necessary to travel abroad to learn about other countries, but others think that it is not necessary to travel abroad because all the information can be seen on TV and the internet. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
text: There is a controversial discussion as to whether it is crucial for us to travel overseas to gain information about them or we can access it by internet and TV programs. However, I am of the opinion that it would be much better if people have a chance to go and see those countries themselves.

On the one hand, travelling play a key role in order to acquire about nations and no one can deny that visiting countries is a much more appealing option. People who hold this view argue that stand a chance of experiencing the real life of local people as well as being in their culture or cultural activities, participating closely could be more effective than obtaining information through the cold-technologies. For instance, by travelling we can watch how they celebrate their festivals and participate in them with locals. In addition, we can make friend with them in which even we can discover more about them.

On the other hand, others who believe that one does not have to find information about other cultures say always, we can easily access details, just with a click of a button which are available 24/7 and free. In fact, this information is accessible in literature, pictures, videos, panoramic maps, 3D model and VR (Virtual Reality) which helps people to learn and gain information more effective. Considering take information through internet, it is worth mentioning that it is hard to travel a place where has a difficult access due to harsh weather such as the Antarctic. Totally, it would be time saving and more economical approach if we discover through internet.
To make a long story short, as far as learning about countries by travelling or internet is concerned, I would like to point out that travelling is more practical than other methods.
